A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Pretty disappointed to see all the negative reviews. I certainly see why people would have issues with this movie\, but Star Wars has never been about crafting a poetically scripted masterpiece. It is about getting lost in a universe far far away\, and on that note this movie absolutely delivered. If you want to have a great time at the movie theater\, get a ticket\, some popcorn and enjoy the next chapter
